sourceMeaningMnemonic: You wake up in <radical>prison</radical> and there is a <radical>big</radical> <radical>mouth</radical> full of <radical>legs</radical> coming really, really close to your own <radical>mouth</radical> so you <kanji>scream</kanji>! Scream because this is terrifying. Scream because it's all you can think to do.
meaningInfo: Imagine a prison where horrible mouth leg creatures are trying to get in your mouth. You don't want to scream because they might get in there, but you can't help it.
readingMnemonic: You <kanji>scream</kanji> and scream and scream until a door bursts open. It's Genghis <reading>Khan</reading> (<ja>かん</ja>) and he looks mad. Apparently your screaming is bothering him and now he's gonna give you a real reason to scream.
readingInfo: Imagine Genghis Khan doing something to make you scream. What is it? What could Genghis Khan do that's worse than what's already happening to you?
